attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tuition fees are rising year by year - thus, the amount of debt students find themselves in is immense. The government should either scrap tuition fees, or should reduce the time it takes to wipe the debt from 25 years to 10 years.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
